

Matthew 1
1:1 SCROLL OF-generating of-lineage OF-JESUS ANOINTED Christ SON of -DAVID David SON of- ABRAHAM -Abraham

Matthew 5

Luke 3

8:1 AND it-BECAME it-occurred IN THE according-to-next consecutively AND also He THRU-WAYS traversed according-to city AND VILLAGE PROCLAIMING heralding AND WELL-MESSAGizING bringing- -well-message THE the KINGdom OF-THE God AND THE TWO-TEN twelve TOGETHER together with to-Him him

Luke 12

Luke 14

Luke 17

John 1
1:1 IN ORIGINal beginning WAS THE saying word AND THE saying word WAS TOWARD THE God AND God WAS THE saying word 
1:2 this WAS IN ORIGINal beginning TOWARD THE God 
1:3 ALL all- THRU through SAME him BECAME came- -be AND apart-from SAME him BECAME came- -be NOT-YET not- yet even ONE one- WHICH HAS-BECOME has-come- -be

Romans 2
2:1 THRU-WHICH wherefore UN-FROM-said defenseless YOU-ARE o ! human ! EVERY THE one -JUDGING one-judging IN WHICH for YOU-ARE-JUDGING THE DIFFERENT different-one YOURself YOU-ARE-DOWN-JUDGING you-are-condemning THE for SAME same- s YOU-ARE-PRACTISING you-are-committing THE one -JUDGING one-judging

1Corinthians 10
10:1 NOT I-AM-WILLING YET YOU (p) ye TO-BE-UN-KNOWING to-be-being-ignorant brothers brethren ! that THE FATHERS OF-US ALL UNDER THE CLOUD WERE AND ALL THRU through THE SEA THRU-CAME passed-through 
10:2 AND ALL INTO THE MOSES are -DIPizED are -baptized IN THE CLOUD AND IN THE SEA

2Corinthians 1
1:1 PAUL commissioner apostle OF-JESUS ANOINTED Christ THRU through WILL OF-God AND Timothy THE brother to-THE OUT-CALLED ecclesia OF-THE God THE one -BEING one-being IN CORINTH TOGETHER together with to-THE the HOLY- ones saints ALL THE ones -BEING ones-being IN WHOLE THE ACHAIA

1:3 blessed THE God AND FATHER OF-THE Master Lord OF-US JESUS ANOINTED Christ THE FATHER OF-THE PITIES AND God OF-EVERY of-all BESIDE-CALLing consolation 
1:4 THE One -BESIDE-CALLING one-consoling US ON EVERY THE CONSTRICTION affliction OF-US INTO THE TO-BE-enABLED to- able US TO-BE-BESIDE-CALLING to-be-consoling THE- ones the-ones IN EVERY CONSTRICTION affliction THRU through THE BESIDE-CALLing consolation WHICH WE-ARE- be ING-BESIDE-CALLED we-are- be ing-consoled SAME selves by THE God

1Timothy 3
3:1 BELIEVing faithful THE saying IF ANY any ON-NOTing supervision IS-cravING OF-IDEAL ideal work he-IS-ON-FEELING he-is-desiring

James 2
2:1 brothers brethren ! OF-ME NO no IN partialities BE-YE-HAVING be-ye-having ! THE BELIEF faith OF-THE Master Lord OF-US JESUS ANOINTED Christ OF-THE esteem glory 
2:2 IF-EVER for MAY-BE-INTO-COMING may-be-entering INTO THE TOGETHER-LEAD synagogue OF-YOU (p) of-ye MAN GOLD-FINGERed with-gold-ring IN GARMENT attire SHINing splendid MAY-BE-INTO-COMING -may-be-entering YET AND also POOR poor- IN FILTHy GARMENT attire 
2:3 AND YE-SHOULD-BE-ON-lookING ye-should-be-looking -on ON THE one -wearING one-wearing THE GARMENT attire THE SHINing splendid AND YE-MAY-BE-sayING may-be-saying to-him YOU BE-sittING be-you-sitting ! here IDEALly AND to-THE POOR poor-one YE-MAY-BE-sayING may-be-saying YOU BE-STANDING be-you-standing ! there OR BE-sittING be-you-sitting ! here UNDER THE UNDER-FOOT footstool OF-ME 
2:4 AND NOT YE-WERE-THRU-JUDGED ye-were-discriminating IN among selves selves AND BECAME ye-became JUDGers judges OF-THRU-accounts of-reasonings wicked 
2:5 HEAR-YE hear-ye ! brothers brethren ! OF-ME beLOVED beloved ! NOT THE God choosES THE POOR- ones poor-ones OF-THE SYSTEM world this RICH rich ones IN BELIEF faith AND tenants enjoyers-of- e-allotment OF-THE KINGdom WHICH He-promisES to-THE ones -LOVING ones-loving Him 
2:6 YOU (p) ye YET UN-VALUE dishonor THE POOR poor-one NOT THE RICH rich-ones ARE-DOWN-ABLING are-tyrannizing-over OF-YOU (p) ye AND they ARE-DRAWING YOU (p) ye INTO JUDGE-instruments tribunals 
2:7 NOT they ARE-HARM-AVERRING are-blaspheming THE IDEAL NAME THE one -BEING-ON-CALLED one-being-invoked ON on over YOU (p) ye 
2:8 IF howbeit LAW YE-ARE-FINISHING ye-are-discharging KING-ic royal according-to THE WRITing scripture YOU-SHALL-BE-LOVING THE NIGH- one associate OF-YOU AS YOURself IDEALly YE-ARE-DOING

Revelation 7
7:1 AND after these these- I-PERCEIVED FOUR MESSENGERS HAVING-STOOD standing ON THE FOUR CORNERS OF-THE LAND earth HOLDING THE FOUR WINDS OF-THE LAND earth THAT NO MAY-BE-BLOWING WIND ON OF-THE the LAND NO-BESIDES nor ON OF-THE the SEA NO-BESIDES nor ON EVERY e any TREE 
7:2 AND I-PERCEIVED other other MESSENGER UP-STEPPING ascending FROM rising OF-SUN HAVING SEAL OF-God LIVING AND he-CRIES SOUND to-voice GREAT loud to-THE FOUR MESSENGERS to-WHOM WAS-GIVEN it-was-given to-them TO-injure THE LAND AND THE SEA 
7:3 sayING NO YE-SHALL-BE-injurING THE LAND NO-BESIDES nor THE SEA NO-BESIDES nor THE TREES UNTIL OF-WHICH which WE-SHOULD-BE-SEALING THE SLAVES OF-THE God OF-US ON OF-THE the foreheads OF-them 
7:4 AND I-HEAR THE NUMBER OF-THE ones -HAVING- been -SEALED ones-having- been -sealed 144 THOUSANDS HAVING- been -SEALED ones-having- been -sealed OUT OF-EVERY tribe OF-SONS of -ISRAEL Israel 
7:5 OUT OF-tribe JUDA of-Judah 12 THOUSANDS HAVING- been -SEALED ones-having- been -sealed OUT OF-tribe REUBEN -Reuben 12 THOUSANDS HAVING- been -SEALED ones-having-been-sealed OUT OF-tribe GAD Gad 12 THOUSANDS HAVING- been -SEALED ones-having-been-sealed 
7:6 OUT OF-tribe ASER Asher 12 THOUSANDS HAVING- been -SEALED ones-having-been-sealed OUT OF-tribe NEPHTHALIM Nephthalim 12 THOUSANDS HAVING- been -SEALED ones-having-been-sealed OUT OF-tribe MANASSEH of-Manasseh 12 THOUSANDS HAVING- been -SEALED ones-having-been-sealed 
7:7 OUT OF-tribe SIMEON Simeon 12 THOUSANDS HAVING- been -SEALED ones-having-been-sealed OUT OF-tribe LEVI Levi 12 THOUSANDS HAVING- been -SEALED ones-having-been-sealed OUT OF-tribe ISSACHAR 12 THOUSANDS HAVING- been -SEALED ones-having-been-sealed 
7:8 OUT OF-tribe ZABULON -Zebulon 12 THOUSANDS HAVING- been -SEALED ones-having-been-sealed OUT OF-tribe JOSEPH Joseph 12 THOUSANDS HAVING- been -SEALED ones-having-been-sealed OUT OF-tribe BENJAMIN -Benjamin 12 THOUSANDS HAVING- been -SEALED ones-having- been -sealed 
7:9 after these these- I-PERCEIVED AND BE-PERCEIVING lo ! THRONG MANY vast WHOM which TO-NUMBER him him it NOT-YET-ONE no-one was -ABLE OUT OF-EVERY NATIONS nation AND tribes of-tribes AND PEOPLES AND TONGUES languages HAVING-STOOD standing IN-VIEW sight-of before OF-THE the THRONE AND IN-VIEW sight-of before OF-THE the LAMBkin HAVING- been -ABOUT-CAST having- been -clothed robes -robes WHITE AND PALMS palm- s IN THE HANDS OF-them

7:11 AND ALL THE MESSENGERS HAD-STOOD stood to-AROUND around OF-THE the THRONE AND OF-THE the SENIORS elders AND OF-THE the FOUR LIVing- ones animals AND THEY-FELL IN-VIEW sight-of before OF-THE the THRONE ON face OF-them AND THEY-worship worship to-THE the God

7:13 AND answerED ONE OUT OF-THE SENIORS elders sayING to-ME these THE ones -HAVING- been -ABOUT-CAST ones-having- been -clothed THE -the robes THE WHITE ANY who (p)  ? THEY-ARE AND ?-WHICH-PLACE whence ? THEY-CAME 
7:14 AND I-HAVE-declarED to-him master lord ! YOU HAVE-PERCEIVED are-aware AND he-said to-ME these ARE THE ones -COMING ones-coming OUT OF-THE CONSTRICTION affliction THE GREAT AND THEY-PLUNGE they-rinse THE robes OF-them AND THEY-WHITEN them IN THE BLOOD OF-THE LAMBkin 
7:15 THRU because-of this THEY-ARE IN-VIEW sight-of before OF-THE the THRONE OF-THE God AND THEY-ARE-offerING-DIVINE-SERVICE to-Him OF-DAY day AND OF-NIGHT night IN THE TEMPLE OF-Him AND THE One -sittING one-sitting ON OF-THE the THRONE SHALL-BE-BOOTHING shall-be-tabernacling ON on over them 
7:16 NOT THEY-SHALL-BE-HUNGERING STILL longer NOT-YET nor-yet THEY-SHALL-BE-THIRSTING STILL -longer NOT-YET neither NO SHOULD-BE-FALLING ON them THE SUN NOT-YET nor EVERY e any BURN- effect heat

Revelation 8
8:1 AND when He-UP-OPENS it-opens THE SEAL THE SEVENth BECAME occurred HUSH IN THE heaven AS as HALF-HOUR 
8:2 AND I-PERCEIVED THE SEVEN MESSENGERS WHO IN-VIEW sight-of before OF-THE the God HAVE-STOOD stand AND WERE-GIVEN to-them SEVEN TRUMPETS

8:9 AND FROM-DIED died THE third OF-THE CREATURES OF-THE the IN THE SEA THE the (p) ones -HAVING having souls AND THE third OF-THE FLOATers ships WAS-THRU-CORRUPTed decayed 
8:10 AND THE third MESSENGER TRUMPETS AND FALLS OUT OF-THE heaven GLEAMer star GREAT large BURNING AS SHINEr torch AND FALLS it-falls ON THE third OF-THE rivers AND ON THE SPRINGS waters 
8:11 AND THE NAME OF-THE GLEAMer star IS- be ING-said UN-DRINK Absinth AND IS-BECOMING THE third OF-THE waters INTO UN-DRINK absinth AND MANY humans FROM-DIED died OUT OF-THE waters that -that THEY-WERE-made-BITTER 
8:12 AND THE FOURth MESSENGER TRUMPETS AND WAS-given-a-BLOW was-eclipsed THE third OF-THE SUN AND THE third OF-THE MOON AND THE third OF-THE GLEAMers stars THAT MAY-BE-BEING-DARKenED THE third OF-them AND THE DAY NO MAY-BE-APPEARING THE -the third OF-her of- her it AND THE NIGHT LIKE-AS likewise

Revelation 9
9:1 AND THE FIFth MESSENGER TRUMPETS AND I-PERCEIVED GLEAMer star OUT OF-THE heaven HAVING-FALLEN INTO THE LAND earth AND WAS-GIVEN to-SAME to-him THE LOCKer key OF-THE WELL OF-THE abyss 
9:2 AND he-UP-OPENS he-opens THE WELL OF-THE abyss AND UP-STEPPed ascended smoke fumes OUT OF-THE WELL AS smoke OF-BURNer of-furnace GREAT large AND IS-DARKenED THE SUN AND THE AIR OUT OF-THE smoke fumes OF-THE WELL 
9:3 AND OUT OF-THE smoke fumes OUT-CAME came-out LOCUSTS INTO THE LAND earth AND WAS-GIVEN was-granted to-them them authority license AS ARE-HAVING authority license THE SCATTER-VENOMS scorpions OF-THE LAND earth 
9:4 AND WAS-declarED it-was-declared to-them THAT NO THEY-SHOULD-BE-injurING THE FODDER grass OF-THE LAND earth NOT-YET nor EVERY e any GREEN green- NOT-YET nor EVERY e any TREE IF NO THE humans ONLY WHO-ANY who- any NOT ARE-HAVING THE SEAL OF-THE God ON OF-THE the foreheads OF-them 
9:5 AND WAS-GIVEN it-was-granted to-them THAT NO THEY-MAY-BE-FROM-KILLING they-may-be-killing them but THAT THEY-SHOULD-BE-BEING-ORDEALizED they-should-be-being-tormented MONTHS FIVE AND THE ORDEALing torment OF-them AS -as ORDEAL torment OF-SCATTER-VENOM of-scorpion when-EVER whenever it-SHOULD-BE-HITTING it-should-be-striking human 
9:6 AND IN THE DAYS those SHALL-BE-SEEKING THE humans THE DEATH AND NOT THEY-SHALL-BE-FINDING it him it AND THEY-SHALL-BE-ON-FEELING they-shall-be-yearning TO-BE-FROM-DYING to-be-dying AND SHALL-BE-FLEEING THE DEATH FROM them 
9:7 AND THE LIKEnesses OF-THE LOCUSTS LIKE -like HORSES HAVING- been -made-READY INTO BATTLE AND ON THE HEADS OF-them AS -as- WREATHS LIKE GOLD AND THE faces OF-them AS -as faces OF-humans

9:9 AND THEY-HAD CUIRASSES AS as CUIRASSES IRON AND THE SOUND OF-THE flyers wings OF-them AS -as SOUND OF-chariots HORSES of-horses MANY RACING INTO BATTLE 
9:10 AND THEY-ARE-HAVING TAILS LIKE SCATTER-VENOMS scorpions AND PIERCers stings WAS IN THE TAILS OF-them AND THE authority license OF-them TO-injure -to-injure THE humans MONTHS FIVE 
9:11 AND THEY-ARE-HAVING ON on over OF-them them KING THE MESSENGER OF-THE abyss NAME to-him to-HEBREW -Hebrew ABADDON AND IN THE GRECIAN Greek NAME he-IS-HAVING APOLLYON  (Destroyer) Apollyon

Revelation 11

22:18 I-AM-TOGETHER-witnessING I-am-witnessing-together for to-EVERY one -HEARING one-hearing THE sayings words OF-THE BEFORE-AVERment prophecy OF-THE SCROLLet this IF-EVER ANY any MAY-BE-ON-PLACING may-be-appending TOWARD these these- SHALL-BE-ON-PLACING shall-be-appending THE God ON him THE BLOWS calamities THE ones -HAVING- been -WRITTEN having- been -written IN SCROLLet this 
22:19 AND IF-EVER ANY any MAY-BE-FROM-LIFTING may-be-eliminating FROM THE sayings words OF-SCROLL OF-THE BEFORE-AVERment prophecy this SHALL-BE-FROM-LIFTING shall-be-eliminating THE God THE PART OF-him FROM SCROLL OF-THE LIFE AND OUT OF-THE city THE HOLY AND OF-THE ones -HAVING- been -WRITTEN having- been -written (p) IN SCROLLet this 
22:20 IS-sayING THE One -witnessING one-testifying these these- YEA I-AM-COMING SWIFTLY AMEN YEA yes BE-YOU-COMING be-you-coming ! Master ! Lord ! JESUS !
